sentence: North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R) on the House floor on Monday said Democrats had declared a war on biology? in supporting the rights of transgender Americans, adding that the party's left-wing movement is forcing children to endure radical expressions of sexuality.? Florida Gov.
author: Brooke Migdon | April 4
title: Rep. Boebert says children should wait until 21 to make life-altering' decisions about gender and sexuality
